name: ColorLink
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color link
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Color Link is a puzzle game where the goal is to connect all the dots of the same color without crossing lines.

THE ALL-ACCESS PASS
The All-Access Pass unlocks 30 extra levels, each more challenging than the last.

SUPPORTED DEVICES
Color Link is available only on Alexa-enabled devices with a screen.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
